channel.title: [amazing][dedi][24/7]crest-scape[amazing][dedi}[24\7]
channel.description:
This is a amazing 317 server which includes: All working specials Working pking drops some ::pickup work to get you in game faster
many different pking zones including multi! SERVER ONLY WORKS WITH CUSTOM CLIENT DOWN THIS HERE !!! !! ! !!!!! !___________________!!_@#_!#_! r]32; [url/]http://download805.mediafire.com/jjwisydjw1yg/mziwnumjqof/CrestScapeClientv7.3.rar[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?bqynyymykyj[/U] [/SIZE]]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?bqynyymykyj[/U] [/SIZE][/url] Tired of the same old shitty servers? Feel like you want to PK or pwn noobs? This is an old server, but still fun. The server IP is: Crest-scape.zapto.org. ( you must have custom client in order to play ) [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/2zizvch.jpg[/img] Castle Wars Features: -All glitches fixed and bugs worked out. -100% no lagg -Paint that's better then runescape's -CUstomized and made with more features -Better then runescape's Castle Wars! [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/2zekm5g.jpg[/img] Working Clan Chat Features: -Ability to make it so you can mute players in your channel. -Like your own IRC channel but in a Private Server -Only people you request are allowed to join! -More fun then Runescape's Clan Chat! [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/x1jbzd.jpg[/img] Features of Farming: -Works 100% no Glitches or bugs. -Every single plant works + you need right seeds\tools to do. [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/24fzlae.jpg[/img] Features of fight pits: -Works 100% no glitches or bugs. -Has paint to tell you how much longer till next round starts. -Working guy that says who won the round before. -Better then Runescape's Because of differen't features and a paint. [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/w9jmuo.jpg[/img] Fletching Features: -Everything works with no glitches or bugs. -When fletching asks if you want to make longbow or shortbow. -When fletching shows the correct movement just like it would in real Runescape! [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/29bd838.jpg[/img] Features of Jad Mini-Game: -Waves shortened to make it easier to win. -Has paint telling you which wave and how much more waves to go! -100% fixed no bugs or glitches Garunteed! [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/16m1sw5.jpg[/img] Kalphite Queen Features: -2 Stages just like in runescape! Bug stage and wierd thing stage! -Uses correct prayers and both are effective! -Hits the same as the Kalphite Queen in RUnescape Does! -KQ lair has all the NPC's that runescape does so Great for Traning! [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/j0b39k.png[/img] Shop Features: 100% working shops no glitches or bugs! -Shops have everything you need! [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/ac95c6.jpg[/img] Features of woodcuting! -Each tree has the right wood Just like Runescape! E.G Mgic trees have mage logs -Dont have to wield axe to cut! -100% revised and edited so there are no bugs or glitches! -All axes working including Dragon Axe Special! [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/1yjr5i.jpg[/img] Quest Features: -Moderate quests not taking to long or to little time, and will ensure you have fun doing them! -All working 100% no bugs or glitches!
Other Features! -Loads of great weapons to pk with! -Dclaws Working with 4 hit spec! (great one) almost done just need to update client d claws work they just dont look like d claws ;P -Vesta + Statius SPECS -Godswords SPECS -PvP Stats System that shows you who was your last kill + how many PvP-points you got! -A unique pvp system! -PvP point needed to buy requirements! -Working Friends List -Great Economy -EVERY SINGLE SKILL WORKS!! -EVER SINGLE MINIGAME WORKS!! -And More!
CrestScape Want to rule, dominate, or just slay? Join our world of battle, war and savage. Join clans and teams to corrupt other people. Destroy people and earn the title master. MORE PICS! [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/2yovnk2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/2mzlkhy.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/e6sxe8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/2e3v0nl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/2zgsxg7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/ftdh5e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/24mgnx1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/se3gbc.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/kf2nir.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/116p5hz.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/etb19i.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/3131zec.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/2lapufo.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/w5q2e.jpg[/img]

My question is, WHY?[/quote]

item.description:
@miah102 wrote:

This is a amazing 317 server which includes:
All working specials
Working pking drops
some ::pickup work to get you in game faster

many different pking zones including multi!
SERVER ONLY WORKS WITH CUSTOM CLIENT
DOWN THIS HERE !!! !! ! !!! !________________!!@#!#! r]32;
[url/]http://download805.mediafire.com/jjwisydjw1yg/mziwnumjqof/CrestScapeClientv7.3.rar
[/SIZE]]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?bqynyymykyj[/U]
[/SIZE]
Tired of the same old shitty servers? Feel like you want to PK or pwn noobs?
This is an old server, but still fun.
The server IP is: Crest-scape.zapto.org. ( you must have custom client in order to play )

2zizvch.jpg777×532

Castle Wars Features:
-All glitches fixed and bugs worked out.
-100% no lagg
-Paint that’s better then runescape’s
-CUstomized and made with more features
-Better then runescape’s Castle Wars!
2zekm5g.jpg784×532

Working Clan Chat Features:
-Ability to make it so you can mute players in your channel.
-Like your own IRC channel but in a Private Server
-Only people you request are allowed to join!
-More fun then Runescape’s Clan Chat!

Features of Farming:
-Works 100% no Glitches or bugs.
-Every single plant works + you need right seeds\tools to do.
24fzlae.jpg771×524

Features of fight pits:
-Works 100% no glitches or bugs.
-Has paint to tell you how much longer till next round starts.
-Working guy that says who won the round before.
-Better then Runescape’s Because of differen’t features and a paint.
w9jmuo.jpg776×530

Fletching Features:
-Everything works with no glitches or bugs.
-When fletching asks if you want to make longbow or shortbow.
-When fletching shows the correct movement just like it would in real Runescape!
29bd838.jpg772×580

Features of Jad Mini-Game:
-Waves shortened to make it easier to win.
-Has paint telling you which wave and how much more waves to go!
-100% fixed no bugs or glitches Garunteed!
16m1sw5.jpg784×538

Kalphite Queen Features:
-2 Stages just like in runescape! Bug stage and wierd thing stage!
-Uses correct prayers and both are effective!
-Hits the same as the Kalphite Queen in RUnescape Does!
-KQ lair has all the NPC’s that runescape does so Great for Traning!
j0b39k.png777×536

Shop Features:
100% working shops no glitches or bugs!
-Shops have everything you need!
ac95c6.jpg778×534

Features of woodcuting!
-Each tree has the right wood Just like Runescape! E.G Mgic trees have mage logs
-Dont have to wield axe to cut!
-100% revised and edited so there are no bugs or glitches!
-All axes working including Dragon Axe Special!
1yjr5i.jpg779×536

Quest Features:
-Moderate quests not taking to long or to little time, and will ensure you have fun doing them!
-All working 100% no bugs or glitches!

Other Features!
-Loads of great weapons to pk with!
-Dclaws Working with 4 hit spec! (great one) almost done just need to update client d claws work they just dont look like d claws
-Vesta + Statius SPECS
-Godswords SPECS
-PvP Stats System that shows you who was your last kill + how many PvP-points you got!
-A unique pvp system!
-PvP point needed to buy requirements!
-Working Friends List
-Great Economy
-EVERY SINGLE SKILL WORKS!!
-EVER SINGLE MINIGAME WORKS!!
-And More!

CrestScape
Want to rule, dominate, or just slay? Join our world of battle, war and savage. Join clans and teams to corrupt other people. Destroy people and earn the title master.
MORE PICS!
